___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___limits-list.description: Required if familyControlsEnabled is true. Time limits settings.

___start.description: Optional. Curfew start time in the format %d:%d:%d.

___secondsPerDay.description: Optional. Seconds for that day for allowance.

___enabled.description: Required. Set to true to enable these settings.

___rangeType.description: Required. Type of day range: 0 = weekday, 1 = weekend.

___end.description: Optional. Curfew end time in the format %d:%d:%d.

___start.description: Optional. Curfew start time in the format %d:%d:%d.

___secondsPerDay.description: Optional. Seconds for that day for allowance.

___enabled.description: Required. Set to true to enable these settings.

___rangeType.description: Required. Type of day range: 0 = weekday, 1 = weekend.

___end.description: Optional. Curfew end time in the format %d:%d:%d.

___start.description: Optional. Curfew start time in the format %d:%d:%d.

___secondsPerDay.description: Optional. Seconds for that day for allowance.

___enabled.description: Required. Set to true to enable these settings.

___rangeType.description: Required. Type of day range: 0 = weekday, 1 = weekend.

___end.description: Optional. Curfew end time in the format %d:%d:%d.

___start.description: Optional. Curfew start time in the format %d:%d:%d.

___secondsPerDay.description: Optional. Seconds for that day for allowance.

___enabled.description: Required. Set to true to enable these settings.

___rangeType.description: Required. Type of day range: 0 = weekday, 1 = weekend.

___end.description: Optional. Curfew end time in the format %d:%d:%d.

___familyControlsEnabled.description: Required. Set to true to use time limits.

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
